title: Stage Lv7-P6-S33
description: Level 7 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Had I known, never would I have agreed to the deal under those terms.
Were she to accept, seldom would we see such dedication in our company.
learning_points: Level 7 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 알았더라면, 그런 조건으로는 절대 거래에 동의하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had I known, never would I have agreed to the deal under those terms.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 수락한다면, 우리 회사에서 그런 헌신을 좀처럼 보지 못할 것이다.
sentences.en: Were she to accept, seldom would we see such dedication in our company.

sentences.kr: 당신이 떠나기로 결정한다면, 당신 같은 전문성을 가진 사람을 좀처럼 찾지 못할 것이다.
sentences.en: Should you decide to leave, rarely will we find someone with your expertise.

sentences.kr: 그들이 투자했더라면, 이제 후회하지 않았을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had they invested, not once would they regret it now.

sentences.kr: 시장이 안정화된다면, 거의 모든 투자자가 수익을 볼 것이다.
sentences.en: Should the market stabilize, barely will any investor lose money.

sentences.kr: 그가 리더가 된다면, 이런 변화를 좀처럼 보지 못했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Were he to become the leader, seldom would we have seen such changes.

sentences.kr: 더 일찍 시작했더라면, 지금 이런 문제는 전혀 없었을 것이다.
sentences.en: Had we started earlier, not at all would we have these problems now.

sentences.kr: 그들이 협력한다면, 이런 성과를 거의 기대하지 못했을 것이다.
sentences.en: Should they collaborate, hardly would we have expected such results.
